title: S
clause_text: S.R.A. and the Concerned Authority shall issue concerned D.R.C. to the developer within a period of one month from the receipt of the proposal. The F.S.I. credit in square meters of built up area shall be stated in the D.R.C. in figures and in words, along with details of the place from where T.D.R. is generated; and where it may be utilized.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
